item.title: The world order weâ€™re leaving behind may be replaced by no order at all | Eduardo Porter
item.description:
Global leaders are dreaming of a US-free world order. Do they stand a chance? In the world being ushered in by Trump, power will prevail over cooperation. We will come to rue having taken this path View image in fullscreen The Canadian prime minister, Mark Carney, inspired a wave of enthusiastic nodding among the cosmopolitan crowd gathered in Davos last month when he took to the podium and proclaimed that the world order underwritten by the United States, which prevailed in the west throughout....
